text: Flight 217 may refer to: *Aero Flight 217, crashed on 8 November 1963 *Pan Am Flight 217, crashed on 12 December 1968. *Aeroflot Flight 217, crashed on 13 October 1972 *Aeropesca Colombia Flight 217, crashed on 26 March 1982 *Azerbaijan Airlines Flight 217, crashed on 23 December 2005 0217
title: Flight 217
